questions.question: An aluminium rod of 2.7cm in diameter and 10cm long, protrudes from a wall maintained at 228°C. The rod is exposed to an environment at 27°C. The convective heat transfer coefficient is 15W/m<sup>2</sup>-K. K<sub>AL</sub> = 200W/m-K. Rod is insulated at the end. Calculate heat loss by fin.
Find the fin efficiency in the above case
